form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY, FORM I-539 ( (REV. 11-1-70)

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE READSCHEENED by NARA 2/A0/2023LLY. Form approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FEE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED. Budget Bureau No. 43 - R0068 IVED "PEE"STAMP APPLICATION TO EXTEND $1000 F PAID No. POO-72 TIME OF TEMPORARY STAYN SEPA DODI SEP 25 1971911 58-6 SLB CHECKED Immigration and Naturalization Service I HEREBY APPLY TO EXTEND MY TEMPORARY STAPaTe) (By) Portland, Oregon M&F THE UNITED STATES under '71 SEP 20 Date 9/20/71 Verified by RIX 1. FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME FILE NUMBER N-250 7. DATE TO WHICH EXTENSION IS REQUESTED NGUYEN Nhat Thi 620124/69 May 1972 2. OTHER NAMES (Include all past and present names; married woman must give her maiden name) 8. REASON FOR COMING TO THE UNITED STATES Tran Dinh Dan 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) Visit children 2173 - 16th Ave. W. Eugene, Oregon 97402 4. DATE OF BIRTH (Mo. - Day - Yr.) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CITIZENSHIP 9. REASON FOR REQUESTING EXTENSION 1906 VietNam VietNam Visit daughter & son-in-law 5. NONIMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION DATE ON WHICH AUTHORIZED STAY EXPIRES B/2 October 17, 1971 6. DATE AND PORT OF LAST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF 10. DATE OF INTENDED DEPARTURE FROM U.S. Honolulu, Hawaii 12-17-69 LAST ARRIVAL IN,U.S. PA 842 May 1972 FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY. APPROVED INS. 11. PASSPORT NUMBER PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) DATE 020124/69 VietNam OF EXTENSION GRANTED SEP 25 1971 PASSPORT EXPIRES ON (Date) TO (Date) ACTION December 1972 JAN.17, DD Wm. L. Pattillo 12. AM AM NOT IN POSSESSION OF A OR EXTENSION DENIED V.D. TO (Date) TRANSPORTATION TICKET FOR MY DEPARTURE OIC OFFICE PORTLAND OREGON 13. Number, Street, City, Province (State) and Country of Permanent Residence 14. MY USUAL OCCUPATION IS: 15. SOCIAL SECURITY No. 177/2 Le Van Duyet, Saigon, VietNam Housewife (If none, state "none") None 16. AM AM NOT married. If you wish to apply for extension for your spouse and children, give the following: (See Instruction #1) NAMES OF SPOUSE AND CHILDREN DATE OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF BIRTH PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) AND EXPIRES ON (Date) NOTE: If spouse and children for whom you are seeking extension do not reside with you, give their complete address on a separate attachment to this application. 17. (Insert "Have" or "Have Not") I Have Not BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES. IF YOU HAVE BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES, COMPLETE THE REST OF THE BLOCK. NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OR BUSINESS N/A KIND OF EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS INCOME PER WEEK DATES SUCH EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS BEGAN AND ENDED N/A brought $ 1000.00 18. IF YOU ARE A TEMPORARY VISITOR FOR PLEASURE (B-2), COMPLETE THIS BLOCK. I HAVE OLLARS IN THE UNITED STATES. I RECEIVE DOLLARS EACH FROM: (Day, Week, Month) (Name and Address) 19. I AM VISITING THE FOLLOWING PERSONS IN THE UNITED STATES NAME RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS Mr. & Mrs. James McGeever Children 2173 - 16th Ave. W. Eugene, Oregon 20. I ATTACH WRITTEN STATEMENT FROM Mr. James McGeever DATED Sept. 17, 1971 IN SUPPORT OF THIS APPLICATION. I BELIEVE SUCH STATEMENT TO BE TRUE AND I MAKE IT PART OF THIS APPLICATION: (See Instruction 6.) I CERTIFY THAT THE ABOVE IS TRUE AND CORRECT SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE ngugen. thi what Sept. 16-1971 I DECLARE THAT THIS DOCUMENT WAS PREPARED BY ME AT THE REQUEST OF THE APPLICANT AND IS BASED ON ALL INFORMATION ADDRESS LABEL FOR NOTICE OF ACTION ON APPLICATION OF WHICH I HAVE ANY KNOWLEDGE. TYPE OR PRINT (VERY FIRMLY AND CLEARLY) YOUR NAME, MAILING ADDRESS, AND IF APPROPRIATE "In Care Of" IN THE SIGNATURE SPACES BELOW. Dree Yuan Hegewer YOUR NAME Mrs. Nguyen Thi Nhat c/o Mr. McGeever DATE Sept. 16, 1971 STREET ADDRESS 2173 - 16th Ave. W. ADDRESS ZIP CITY AND STATE Eugene, Oregon 97402 2173 - 16th Ave. W. For Statistics ATTACH YOUR FORM 1.94 OR SW 434 Eupencium Oregon 97402 FORM I-539 (REV. 11-1-70) Received Tr. In Ret'd. Tr. Out Completed SEP 22 1971 SEP 25 1971
